name: Jsonlines
tagline: Documentation for the JSON Lines text file format
body:
### JSON Lines: Simple. Like JSON.

This page describes the JSON Lines text format. JSON Lines is a convenient format for storing
structured data that may be processed one record at a time. It works well with unix-style scripts
shell pipelines.

JSON Lines files may be saved with the file extension `.jl`. Stream compressors like `gzip` or `bzip2`
are recommended for saving space, resulting in `.jl.gz` or `.jl.bz2` files.
